Actually, the mines give us rocks that contain raw ore

We could extract the ore in the mine with pickaxes, but ok...

Floor 4079: translations for other posts:

1. stupid answers: fuzzy pineapples

2. Ban: banned for making me say kuai liang as groot says i am groot.

3. Make a wish: granted you get dictionaries and a thesaurus. I wish to speak like me again!

211608122023

Floor 4080: You just put on some fresh clothes before getting to this floor. Now in a tan and cream cotton number with a hooded tan cloak, you enter the floor. This place seems to have many metal corridors and shiny black floors. It feels a bit like a fortress. Your footsteps echo in a strange way. You suddenly feel a prescence, a prescence you have not felt since...

Quickly you reach into your bag of holding and pull out a metal tube with come buttons on it. From your right comes some loud raspy breathing. You push a button on the tube and a green hot plasma trapped in a tangible force field appears out the end. You hold it in front of you just in time to block a red version that comes screaming out of the dark at you. You cannot properly describe the battle that happens next, but it would be similar to this.

Floor 4081: hatters hatting hats, hats hatting hatters, cobblers cobbling cobblers, fishers fishing fish and fish fishing fishers
